semantic_identifier: 143: feat: Sales Accelerator: Add manager dashboard panel for bypass rate metrics (7/30 day filter)

sections.text:
## Description

Implements a lightweight “Bypass rate” panel on the Sales_Accelerator manager/sales ops dashboard using existing bypass events in the analytics warehouse (no new instrumentation or schema changes).

What’s included:
- New dashboard widget: Bypass rate = bypass_count / total_eligible_actions, plus raw counts.
- Breakdown tables segmented by workflow (best-next-action, forecast updates, risk alerts) and by team.
- Date range selector with two presets: last 7 days and last 30 days (default: 7 days).

Implementation (high level):
- Backend: Adds a read-only API endpoint that proxies parameterized warehouse queries (workflow + team group-by) and returns a normalized response for the UI.
- Querying: Reuses the existing bypass event fact table/views; computes bypass_count and eligible_count per segment and derives bypass_rate in the query layer to keep UI logic minimal.
- Frontend: Adds a new panel component to the manager dashboard route, wiring it to the new endpoint and the date-range preset control.
- Guardrails: Handles empty/low-volume segments (returns 0s/“no data” state) and avoids divide-by-zero.

User impact:
- Managers/Sales Ops can monitor organizational drift via bypass behavior by team/workflow over the last 7/30 days without any tracking changes.

## How Has This Been Tested?

staging
